User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow admin and private pages
Disallow: /admin
Disallow: /profile
Disallow: /checkout
Disallow: /orders
Disallow: /onauthsuccess
Disallow: /resetpassword

# Allow important pages
Allow: /
Allow: /products
Allow: /blog
Allow: /contact
Allow: /auth

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://manafoods.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl delay (optional)
Crawl-delay: 1
